notes.content:
=== Manager & Performance ===
‚Ä¢ "Summarize this employee's goal progress for H1 2025 and highlight their top 3 accomplishments in business language I can use in our review conversation."

‚Ä¢ "Based on this employee's goals, feedback, and activities, suggest 3 specific development recommendations and 2 coaching questions I can ask in our next 1:1."

‚Ä¢ "Draft a performance summary paragraph for [Employee Name] focusing on impact, strengths, and 2-3 growth areas, aligned with our rating of 'Exceeds Expectations'."

=== Goal Setting ===
‚Ä¢ "Turn these bullet points into 3 SMART performance goals for a [Role] in [Department], aligned with our 2025 business priorities."

‚Ä¢ "Review this list of goals and propose clearer success metrics and target dates, keeping our existing rating scale in mind."

=== Workforce Analytics ===
‚Ä¢ "Show me a plain-language summary of regretted attrition in my organization over the last 12 months and the top 3 drivers based on available data."

‚Ä¢ "Compare internal mobility rates and time-to-fill for key roles in [Region A] vs [Region B] and suggest 3 actions I can take to improve internal moves."

=== Employee Self-Service ===
‚Ä¢ "Explain my company's parental leave policy in simple terms for someone based in [Country] and tell me the 3 key actions I must take before going on leave."

‚Ä¢ "I want to change my work schedule to 80%. What options do I have under company policy and what are the implications for pay and benefits?"

=== Recruiting ===
‚Ä¢ "Rewrite this job description for a [Role] to be candidate-friendly, bias-aware, and aligned with our global job catalog."

‚Ä¢ "Based on my profile and current role, suggest 3 internal job opportunities and the top 5 skills I need to develop to be competitive for them."

=== Learning & Development ===
‚Ä¢ "Given this employee's current role, target role, and skill profile, generate a 90-day learning plan using content available in SuccessFactors Learning."

=== Succession Planning ===
‚Ä¢ "Summarize succession coverage for my critical roles, highlighting where we have no ready-now successors and suggesting mitigation actions."

=== Prompt Best Practices ===
‚úì Be specific about time ranges
‚úì Use exact field names when possible
‚úì Specify output format ("5 bullet points", "draft text I can paste")
‚úì Use follow-ups: "Now make this shorter and more motivational"
notes.title: ü§ñ Joule Prompts Library - SuccessFactors

notes.content:
Production Environment:
https://your-company.sapsf.com
Company ID: YOUR_COMPANY_ID

Key Contacts:
- System Admin: admin@your-company.com
- HR Admin: hradmin@your-company.com
- Support: support@your-company.com

notes.content:
API Endpoints:

OData API:
https://api.successfactors.com/odata/v2/

Authentication:
- OAuth 2.0 (recommended)
- Basic Auth (legacy)

Rate Limits:
- 20,000 calls/hour
- 100 calls/minute burst

Documentation:
https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_SUCCESSFACTORS_PLATFORM/d599f15995d348a1b45ba5603e2aba9b/03e1fc3791684367a6a76a614a2916de.html
notes.title: API Integration Reference
